title: Tour with Surprises 2 || Dan Howell
body:
Chapter 2 - My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark 

A/N: I know you had to wait months for this but here is part two of my tour story, I hope it was at least worth the wait!

Word Count: 1.2K

POV: Third Person

MASTERLIST // PART ONE

She had been waiting all day for this. The familiar noise was almost like music in her ears. It was an incoming skype call that had her filled with excitement throughout the morning, her work and dinner. She almost sprinted towards her laptop and threw herself onto the bed. A bowl of popcorn and a glass of Ribena on her bedside table showed that this was not going to be a short call.

“Hi sweetheart, can you hear me?” Dan asked, pressing a few buttons on his mac before he appeared on the screen and he looked into the camera.

“Yes, loud and clear.” Y/N smiled at her boyfriend, whose face she missed dearly.

He still looked perfect despite the slightly pixely camera. After she saw herself on the screen too, she quickly ran her fingers through her hair to fix it.

“It’s so good to see you, I miss you like crazy.” Dan said taking in his girlfriends appearance. She was sitting on their bed and wore one of his old t-shirts, that looked huge on her body. He loved the sight of her in his clothes and immediately wished he could be there with her.

“I miss you too, handsome. What city are you in today?” She asked and examined Dan’s surroundings. He was leaning against the wooden headboard of a twin sized hotel bed.

“We’re in Brisbane today and heading to Sydney next. The show today was literally so good. One could really tell that the crowd enjoyed it and that made me quite happy.” Dan told Y/N, who listened carefully to every word he said.

“I have already seen lots of positive feedback to the tour on Twitter. And I also came across some very cute meet and greet pictures.” She smiled while talking. Y/N was glad she had twitter to stay updated with her boyfriend’s busy life. That way she didn’t feel that far away from everything, almost like she was there with them.

“I’m so glad the fans like it. Today Phil was even given some super awesome socks, he can’t wait to wear them. He’s getting less and less nervous with each show, you know?”

“Ah I’m proud of our Philly and of you of course.” Y/N said, puckering her lips and making a kissing sound. Dan smiled and blew her a kiss in response.

“Phil’s asleep already, all this traveling and being on stage can be pretty tiring. Amazing but tiring.” Dan explained supressing a yawn.

“And now I’m here keeping you up.” Y/N said with pout, feeling sorry.

“I’d stay up all night only for you, Y/N. Just being able to hear your voice and see how pretty you are is worth any amount of tiredness and lack of sleep.” Dan said, eyeing his girlfriend on the screen lovingly. She made an ‘aww’ sound and blushed in return.

“But enough about me, tell me about your day.” He added.

“There’s not that much to talk about. I got up at 7am, had a decent day at work and made myself some pasta for dinner… Oh and I also dreamt of you.” She told him, replaying her day in her head.

“You dreamt of me?” Dan asked with a slight smirk on his face.

“Yes, I even miss you when I’m asleep.” Y/n explained, smiling into the camera.

“What kind of dream was it?” He wanted to know, wiggling his eyebrows.

“Daan!” She groaned hiding her face from him, it was so unfamiliar and new to talk about things like that over skype.  

“Did I do some sexy stuff in that dream of yours?” Dan tried, being pretty straight forward quite bluntly.

Y/N couldn’t help but blush a little. She liked dirty talking and she also missed Dan in that kind of way, but she was only slowly warming up to this online thing.

“uh…maybe some.” She admitted, remembering the 18+ scenes of her dreams where Dan was touching and caressing every part of her body.

Dan started shifting and changing his position. “I probably should remove that laptop from my crotch because well… my hard on is pressing against it.” He said, looking directly at her through the screen.

“Oh my god, Dan.” Y/N whisper-screamed at her boyfriend, taking a pillow from next to her and hiding her face with it.

“Don’t worry, Phil is in a separate hotel room this time, plus he is asleep.” Dan told her, making her drop the pillow and show him a sexy smile.

“You always get so horny when you’re on your period, it’s unbelievable.” Dan said while shaking his head but there was a slight smirk on his face revealing that he obviously liked that.  

“My period?” Y/N asked and tilted her head sideways. There was a look of confusion and surprise on her face as she let go off a little ‘huh’ sound. The tingling sensation in her tummy and downwards had vanished all of a sudden, it almost felt like she had been thrown off track for a few seconds.

“Ah yes, shouldn’t you be on it by now?” Dan answered, it wasn’t unusual that he knew her period was around the corner sooner than she did. He was just better at memorizing dates and knowing what day of the week it was. Y/N’s face went from confused to normal again.

“Totally forgot that it’s almost the end of the month already. I haven’t gotten it yet, but I guess it will surprise me in the next few days.” She explained.

She was one day off, but that wasn’t unusual, right? Irregular periods are not that uncommon for her so she didn’t think that much of it. Instead Dan and her kept talking about everything they could think of. Dan swooned over all the beautiful cities he saw, the delicious food he ate and all the people he met. Y/N told him about her days at work, the weather in London, the fact that her mum’s birthday party was in week and the new series she started to watch. It was crazy how different their stories and experiences were.

At 10pm local time in London Dan’s eyes started to fall shut ever so often, although he really wanted to stay awake for her, his body demanded sleep. When Y/N realized that it was 4am where her boyfriend currently was, her eyes widened in shock.

“You really need to sleep, Dan!” she almost shouted.

He knew that she right but didn’t want her to be.

“I don’t want to leave.” He whispered starring at Y/N through the camera of his laptop.

“Me neither but I guess we have to. We can skype again as soon as possible, okay?”

“Definitely, otherwise I would go insane because I miss you so much.”

She smiled at his sweet comment.

“Goodnight Dan, I love you.” She then said, knowing that he would have to be up in only a few hours.

“I love you too.” He answered and then they ended the call at the same time.

Y/N turned off her laptop, finished the snacks she had prepared earlier and got ready for bed. As she slipped under her duvet she was 100% sure that her period was just a normal day late and would probably start tomorrow or even a day after that. There wasn’t a single doubt about that in her head. She even remember to put a pad in her underwear, just in case she would get her period during the night.

But she didn’t…

“You dreamt of me?” Dan asked with a slight smirk on his face.

“Yes, I even miss you when I’m asleep.” Y/n explained, smiling into the camera.

“What kind of dream was it?” He wanted to know, wiggling his eyebrows.

“Daan!” She groaned hiding her face from him, it was so unfamiliar and new to talk about things like that over skype.  

“Did I do some sexy stuff in that dream of yours?” Dan tried, being pretty straight forward quite bluntly.

Y/N couldn’t help but blush a little. She liked dirty talking and she also missed Dan in that kind of way, but she was only slowly warming up to this online thing.

“uh…maybe some.” She admitted, remembering the 18+ scenes of her dreams where Dan was touching and caressing every part of her body.

Dan started shifting and changing his position. “I probably should remove that laptop from my crotch because well… my hard on is pressing against it.” He said, looking directly at her through the screen.

“Oh my god, Dan.” Y/N whisper-screamed at her boyfriend, taking a pillow from next to her and hiding her face with it.

“Don’t worry, Phil is in a separate hotel room this time, plus he is asleep.” Dan told her, making her drop the pillow and show him a sexy smile.

“You always get so horny when you’re on your period, it’s unbelievable.” Dan said while shaking his head but there was a slight smirk on his face revealing that he obviously liked that.  

“My period?” Y/N asked and tilted her head sideways. There was a look of confusion and surprise on her face as she let go off a little ‘huh’ sound. The tingling sensation in her tummy and downwards had vanished all of a sudden, it almost felt like she had been thrown off track for a few seconds.

“Ah yes, shouldn’t you be on it by now?” Dan answered, it wasn’t unusual that he knew her period was around the corner sooner than she did. He was just better at memorizing dates and knowing what day of the week it was. Y/N’s face went from confused to normal again.

“Totally forgot that it’s almost the end of the month already. I haven’t gotten it yet, but I guess it will surprise me in the next few days.” She explained.

She was one day off, but that wasn’t unusual, right? Irregular periods are not that uncommon for her so she didn’t think that much of it. Instead Dan and her kept talking about everything they could think of. Dan swooned over all the beautiful cities he saw, the delicious food he ate and all the people he met. Y/N told him about her days at work, the weather in London, the fact that her mum’s birthday party was in week and the new series she started to watch. It was crazy how different their stories and experiences were.

At 10pm local time in London Dan’s eyes started to fall shut ever so often, although he really wanted to stay awake for her, his body demanded sleep. When Y/N realized that it was 4am where her boyfriend currently was, her eyes widened in shock.

“You really need to sleep, Dan!” she almost shouted.

He knew that she right but didn’t want her to be.

“I don’t want to leave.” He whispered starring at Y/N through the camera of his laptop.

“Me neither but I guess we have to. We can skype again as soon as possible, okay?”

“Definitely, otherwise I would go insane because I miss you so much.”

She smiled at his sweet comment.

“Goodnight Dan, I love you.” She then said, knowing that he would have to be up in only a few hours.

“I love you too.” He answered and then they ended the call at the same time.

Y/N turned off her laptop, finished the snacks she had prepared earlier and got ready for bed. As she slipped under her duvet she was 100% sure that her period was just a normal day late and would probably start tomorrow or even a day after that. There wasn’t a single doubt about that in her head. She even remember to put a pad in her underwear, just in case she would get her period during the night.

But she didn’t…
